subject: [Radiance-general] Desktop Radiance installation
body:
Dear All,

I am a new user of Radiance. For getting a daylighting output, I usually prepare a model in Ecotect and? export it to radiance, which gives me? the randered image. I realized that ,If I could?install Desktop Radiance from the website than total process could be shorter and could give me more realistic simulation output.?For installing Desktop Radiance, I require AutoCAD R14 or 2002 version. I have the latar version of AutoCAD , but dont have earlier version. Can anyone?give me a clue?for getting that AutoCAD R14 or how can I install Desktop Radiance .
?
Thanks for your help.

Mah??
